item.title: About
item.description: Hello! Iâ€™m a researcher at the National Centre for Suicide Research and Prevention, part of the Institute of Clinical Medicine at the University of Oslo. My journey has led me to contribute to an exciting project called PERMANENS, a collaborative effort spanning Ireland, Sweden, Spain, and Norway. Weâ€™re leveraging machine learning to create prediction models using data from population registries. These models help us understand self-harm and suicide mortality risks, and weâ€™re even crafting a clinical decision support system software to predict potential suicide risk for individual patients.
